original_title: The Adventurous Adventures of One Direction
overview: The evil Lord Faptaguise is back!  And he has a plan so dastardly, only one hero can stop him!  Well, five heroes.  Namely... One Direction!  Join 1D on their wildest adventure yet, as they save the world from doom and discover the true power of friendshiphood.
tagline: I wanna save you, Wanna save your heart tonight
title: The Adventurous Adventures of One Direction
